name: Cichlid Eat Forever
description:
Be a pet fish.

A kinda janky entry for Fishing Jam 2: https://itch.io/jam/fishing-jam-2

Controls:

WASD + Mouse to swim/look around.

Tap Spacebar to swim much faster.

Hold Left Shift to slow down & move with greater precision.

Press E to dart towards food that's very close to your mouth.

Objectives:

There are none. You are a pet fish.

Some things you can do:

- Swim around the tank.

- Bop the plant-things.

- Knock little stones around.

- Hang out in the toy castle.

- Get sucked against the water filter. (This is harmless.)

- Overlap pellets with your mouth to eat them.*

- Try to exit the tank. (Don't worry, you will always be put back.)

*Note re: eating: Your mouth is located slightly below the camera, so you may find eating challenging. The E key helps a little to give you a nudge if you're close, as does slowing down & moving more carefully with Left Shift.

added in build 2 (11/6 - after the jam) :

- plant-things you can kinda bop around

- more rocks

- a passage under one of the rocks

- a bubble tube / bubbles

- a feeding schedule (pellets drop every minute or so)

- if you manage to leap out of the tank, you will hit the floor and start to suffocate, but get tossed unceremoniously back into the tank before that can happen

- you must align the food with your mouth to eat it

- eating a pellet will flash the screen green for a second

- advanced fish controls

- other minor things (like wires leading out of the various powered apparatus)
